snippet.title: ABC Sports Indy Racing: Road to the Indianapolis 500 Intro PC
snippet.description:
Here is what i believe is the first video uploaded for this 1997 release, which is the first of 4 dedicated games ever produced for what is now the NTT IndyCar Series.

This game is based on the 1997 portion of the 1996-1997 Indy Racing League.


The next release is Indy Racing 2000 for the Nintendo 64 based on the 1999 Pepboys Indy Racing League.

Then IndyCar Series for the PS2 & XBOX was based on the 2002 Indy Racing League.

And the most recent release, IndyCar Series 2005, published in 2004, based on the 2003 Indy Racing League IndyCar Series
